snippet: If the Trans-Pacific Partnership fails, the national security of America will be severely harmed.
abstract: Op-Ed article by policy experts Roger C Altman and Richard N Haass contends passage of legislative approach called Trade Promotion Authority is essential both to passage of Trans-Pacific Partnership and to American security; debunks notion that defeat of TPP will help ease American inequality; holds failure to pass bill will destabilize many of our key Asian allies and cast doubt on America's reliability.

byline.original: By ROGER C. ALTMAN and RICHARD N. HAASS

lead_paragraph: If the Trans-Pacific Partnership fails, the national security of America will be severely harmed.

headline.print_headline: Why the Asian Trade Deal Matters

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
